folderSyncPaths.rootLocal_Desc: Path checked first, if this exists, wil be the most optimal.
folderSyncPaths.rootRemove_Desc: Secondary path, often a network path. Useful if running same app on a local server and a remote machine
folderSyncPaths.filterFolderName_Desc: When loading all of the folders, this will filter the name for ones to sync for speed
folderSyncPaths.folderNamesToSkip_Desc: Mark certain folders to never look at
folderSyncPaths.extensionsToSkip_Desc: Mark extensions of files in your folders to ignore

runtimeFlags.runtimeFlags_Desc: Runtime Settings to respond to Creating/Deleting/Updating new folders and images, Valid Values: None, NoneLog, Normal
runtimeFlags.sourceRedownload_Desc: Do you want to download from smugmug over local file? Useful to pull down changes made remote (rotating, keywords, etc)
runtimeFlags.forceRefresh_Desc: Force refreshing images regardless if the keywords are or are not different
runtimeFlags.imageUploadThrottle_Desc: How many images to upload in parallel

keySecrets.apiValues_Desc: SmugMUg API Key/Secret for your registered application
keySecrets.userValues_Desc: Token and Secret provided to you (see GENERATEKEYS in  README.md for use with this app

uploaderConfig.uploadPath_Desc: Folder path within the account to put newly uploaded galleries
